Name: Deathmatch Classic
About the game: Enjoy fast-paced multiplayer gaming with Deathmatch Classic (a.k.a. DMC). Valve's tribute to the work of id software, DMC invites players to grab their rocket launchers and put their reflexes to the test in a collection of futuristic settings.
Meta Title: Deathmatch Classic: Jun 1, 2001, Valve and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Deathmatch Classic? Check out the release date (Jun 1, 2001), developer insights from Valve, and a complete game summary.
